author: cnbc.com
title: Executech Announces Acquisition of Red Rock IT
text:
Leading IT Services Company to Acquire New Clients and Expand Services
SOUTH JORDAN, Utah--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Executech has announced today the acquisition of Red Rock IT. The acquisition includes the purchase of Red Rock clients and the integration of Red Rock team members.
The acquisition was a collaborative effort between the ownership of Executech and Red Rock. Employees of Red Rock will work under Executech leadership to service their respective clients and expand new services for Executech.
“We are very excited to welcome the Red Rock team into the Executech family. This addition to our company will help us expand into other areas of our industry that we have yet to explore,” said Eric Montague , President of Executech.
Red Rock clients will be integrated seamlessly into Executech’s existing services. Red Rock has focused on providing quality remote IT support to its clients. With this new addition, Executech will be preparing to launch more remote support IT services to clients across the Intermountain West.
Executech has experienced tremendous growth over the past few years, and this acquisition is another testament to the success of the company. “We look forward to expanding our services and operations in Utah and across the Intermountain West over the coming years,” said Montague.
About Executech
Executech ( https://www.executech.com/ ) is Utah’s Premier IT services provider. Founded in 1999, Executech provides enterprise-quality IT to small and medium-sized organizations across the Intermountain West. Executech is defined by its people, and every technician serves clients onsite and is available 24/7/365. With no contracts or commitments, Executech’s success is dependent on providing its clients with superior customer service. For every need and any situation, Executech is an elite partner in delivering the best IT services, products, and support.
